---
title: LEVITT SAFETY
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: levitt_safety
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with LEVITT SAFETY. The average
  contract duration was 0.52 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $245.0K.
  The longest contract was 5 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $11.8M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '111'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '10%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '114%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.55'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '10.7M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.52'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '245.0K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '11.8M'
